engineering_design_principles.mechanism: Serve to visually represent shape and elevation changes of land surface in a concise and intuitive manner
Aiding in understanding terrain's topography without need for detailed numerical data
Structured as closed curves on a grid, connecting points at same elevation above a reference datum
By spacing lines at regular intervals, density and proximity indicate steepness and gradient of terrain
Provides a 3D representation of land's surface on a 2D grid
